title: Arroz Con Pollo
directions: 1- Combine Soup Mix and water. set aside2- Brown chicken (season) in hot oil3- Remove chicken to plate (not cooked through at this point)4- Saute onion + garlic. Add Chicken5- Add tomato soup, cover + simmer 20 Min6- Stir in rice. Cover + Simmer 30-35 Min. Add peas during last 5 min
